attributes.title: So disappointed.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to learn more about the best lil Cheeto out there but sadly every time I open it, my phone turns off and restarts. I’m not sure if it is due to the lack of effort put into it or maybe there’s too many ignorant people on it at once.. either way it’s just so sad that I’m the middle of this pandemic And human rights movement I can’t keep up with the annoying orange :(

attributes.title: 🤮TOOK ALL MY MONEY!
attributes.review: I got this app to keep up to date on our AMAZING President’s campaign. I also ended up donating to the important cause that is Donald Trump🥰. I found a week later that my bank account had been drained of all my money. I worked hard for that money!😡I bet the radical leftists hacked into it and took MY MONEY! I no longer support this app! Not to mention that I received hundreds of notifications all day.

attributes.title: This app sexually harassed me!
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded and first opened this app, men started following me everywhere. They would touch me and hurt me and look at me funny. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP, it ILLEGALLY shares your location with creepy old men looking to get some. Luckily I deleted the app before I entered my house, otherwise they would have known where I love and might have come back later. This app is the perfect representation of trump though.

attributes.title: Not worth it
attributes.review: This app has caused my phone to glitch horribly. Before I got this app my phone was working perfectly fine nothing wrong but once I downloaded the app my phone started to glitch and not work as well. It was so bad I had to take it in to the Apple store for it to get fixed, they were unable to fix it and I had to get a whole new phone. SO DO NOT GET THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO SPEND HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS ON A NEW PHONE!!!!

attributes.title: The worst app out here
attributes.review: Today I downloaded it because i want to know everything about Trump because he’s the #69 best president😖 when i downloaded it i was so excited. I tried to use it walking my trex on a leash and it threw her on the freeway without me😭 When i retrieved her, she was a burnt orange cheeto and had a blonde wig without a lace front. I’m so mad. no one download this app unless you want your baby thrown onto the freeway

attributes.title: APP IS A VIRUS
attributes.review: this app is AWFUL it’s just a virus for your phone!! the virus sends notifications to your phone about FAKE NEWS and 🤢 trump 🤮 i can’t believe this is even allowed in the app store. it’s full of racist, sexist, and homophobic ideals and is very offensive towards the common good of society. PLEASE don’t download this it’s a waste of time and will show you ugly pictures of a cheeto man :-( it’s blinding 💋 please to do better app store i don’t want this here 😍

attributes.title: What the!?
attributes.review: Before i downloaded this app my iPhone 7plus was perfectly fine! But after downloading this app my phone glitches and randomly turns my location on? Who is watching me? This app should be deleted IMMEDIATELY. I do not recommend this app to anyone who has an older model phone. So after this awful experience i no longer think I’m going to be voting for Mr. Trump In this upcoming election. Vote Joe 2020

attributes.title: Horrible bunker boy needs to go away
attributes.review: Terrible, right when I opened the app I was greeted with a warning saying if could send me back to my country if I didn’t tap agree, it’s laggy and when I went to the questions page to ask why it was laggy it told me I should go back to China... never getting this app again don’t use it, it is racist, homophobic, and sexist... hmmmm just like bunker boy himself!

attributes.title: What This App and The Trump Administration Causes....
attributes.review: This app and Trump 2020 has caused countless African American people to lose their lives, put undocumented children in cages, caused thousands of Americans to lose their lives due to COVID-19, and has caused endless systemic racism and discrimination to every minority group. If you are considering voting for him in 2020, you are against equal rights, women’s rights, black rights, trans rights, and so many more. A vote for trump is a vote against all except white straight males.

attributes.title: umm no😌❤️
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app for comfort and reassurance of our beloved president but you wanna know what showed up a big orange screaming at me the minute i opens the app and you would think that if i closed the app the screaming would stop but noo i keep hearing it it’s almost like he’s outside so i took the liberty of deleting this app and you should too 
ya know for your own ears and life i still hear him screaming”VOTE FOR ME OR I WILL KILL YOUR FAMILY”
